messages.subject: Re: UnschoolingDiscussion is moving!
messages.msgSnippet: The google list is still there, for those who prefer google s interface.
messages.messageBody: The google list is still there, for those who prefer google's interface.

messages.subject: UnschoolingDiscussion is moving!
messages.msgSnippet: But don t worry. It will be painless! :-) 2 simple steps. 1) Click on a link in a message. It will look like: Subject: Google Email Verification Welcome to
messages.messageBody:
But don't worry. It will be painless! :-)

2 simple steps.

1) Click on a link in a message. It will look like:

Subject: Google Email Verification

Welcome to Google Accounts. To activate your account and verify your e-mail
address, please click on the following link:

2) After you create your account, *IF* you don't want individual emails, if the account link
doesn't take you to your groups page, you will need one more step. Go to:

http://groups.google.com/

Click on Manage My Subscriptions.

And that's it!

Why move?

Anyone who has tried searching the archives of a Yahoo group knows what an enormous
pain in the tuchus it can be. There may be over 110,000 posts in the
UnschoolingDiscussion archive, but it takes time and dedication to get anything out of
them. :-/

Google has created groups with actual searchable archives. Despite it being Beta it has
some very nifty features and we're going to be moving the group there to take advantage
of them.

For those who never visit the posts at the web, the email delivery will be exactly the same.
Just as with Yahoo, Google sends out individual emails, digests or you can opt for no mail
and read at the website. Google also offers a summary as an option.

The biggest changes are at the website.

* No more picture ads :-) (Just Google text ads which won't slow down the loading of
pages.)

* Posts are displayed like a message board. (Either titles only or titles with the first few
lines.) Replies appear beneath the original post so it's easy to skip topics that don't
interest you.

* Sort posts by original posting date or most recent reply.

* Mark topics that interest you and display only those.

* Rate posts up to 5 stars you think were especially helpful! :-)

* Get an email alert when someone replies to a topic.

* RSS feeds. Don't be scared! It's like a summary page of the most recent posts. Many
newer browsers can keep track of your RSS subscriptions. You just click on the
subscription name and it will display summaries of the most recent (15, 50, 100) posts.
You can also have GoogleReader do that (http://www.google.com/reader/things/intro).

There's more about Google Groups at:

http://groups.google.com/intl/en/googlegroups/about.html

Joyce Fetteroll, Pam Sorooshian and Sandra Dodd, UnschoolingDiscussion owners

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: UnschoolingDiscussion is moving!
messages.msgSnippet: ... We ll keep the list alive to keep the archives but the new conversation will move over ss soon as Google approves the membership list. Adding 2000+ members
messages.messageBody:
On Mar 30, 2006, at 4:43 PM, wifetovegman2002 wrote:

> So when will this list be shut down, Joyce?

We'll keep the list alive to keep the archives but the new
conversation will move over ss soon as Google approves the membership
list. Adding 2000+ members all at once sent up some red flags and a
live person needs to approve it.

Joyce

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: UnschoolingDiscussion is moving!
messages.msgSnippet: ... So when will this list be shut down, Joyce? ~Susan McGlohn (in VA) wifetovegman
messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, Joyce Fetteroll
<fetteroll@...> wrote:
>
> But don't worry. It will be painless! :-)
>


So when will this list be shut down, Joyce?

~Susan McGlohn (in VA)
wifetovegman

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] UnschoolingDiscussion is moving!
messages.msgSnippet: I m already on a few Google groups... will this look the same for me? Also, when will this switch take place? ... Andrea L. Roher -aka- Evenstar75@gmail.com
messages.messageBody:
I'm already on a few Google groups... will this look the same for me?
Also, when will this switch take place?

On 3/30/06, Joyce Fetteroll <fetteroll@...> wrote:
> But don't worry. It will be painless! :-)
>
> 2 simple steps.
>
> 1) Click on a link in a message. It will look like:
>
> Subject: Google Email Verification

-----
Andrea L. Roher
-aka- Evenstar75@...
Searching for my place in "Life, the Universe, and Everything" one day
at a time.
Maybe I've finally found it... in NH! (www.FreeStateProject.org)
Visit my blog at evenstar75.blogspot.com
